newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy's Prodi to meet coalition partners Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Italy's Prodi to meet coalition partners Thursday.

text.p: Italian Prime Minister Romano Prodi will meet partners in his centre-left coalition on Thursday, political sources said.
Some members of the coalition have criticised Prodi for comments he made on Sunday accusing parliament of not moving quickly enough on legislation to ease unemployment.
Prodi returns to Rome later on Tuesday after a two-day trip to Poland and Slovenia.
